briefdescription.para: Retrieves the physical device's path tracing capabilities.
Destroys all bottom and top level acceleration structures.

simplesect.para: Returns the top level acceleration structure.

memberdef.argsstring: (const StorageBuffer< Vertex > &vertexBuffer, const StorageBuffer< uint32_t > &indexBuffer, bool allowTransforms) const -> Blas
memberdef.name: modelToBlas

briefdescription.para: Used to convert wavefront models to a bottom level acceleration structure.

parameterdescription.para: A vertex buffer of some geometry.
An index buffer of some geometry.

simplesect.para: Returns the bottom level acceleration structure.

briefdescription.para: Used to convert a bottom level acceleration structure instance to a Vulkan geometry instance.

parameterdescription.para: A bottom level acceleration structure instance.

briefdescription.para: Used to prepare building the bottom level acceleration structures.

parameterdescription.para: Vertex buffers of all geometry in the scene.
Index buffers of all geometry in the scene.

briefdescription.para: Builds all bottom level acceleration structures.

parameterdescription.para: A vector of RAYEX_NAMESPACE::Blas objects containing all bottom level acceleration structures prepared in createBottomLevelAS().

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::vector< std::shared_ptr< GeometryInstance >> &geometryInstances, vk::BuildAccelerationStructureFlagsKHR flags=vk::BuildAccelerationStructureFlagBitsKHR::ePreferFastTrace, bool reuse=false)

briefdescription.para: Build the top level acceleration structure.

parameterdescription.para: A vector of bottom level acceleration structure instances.

briefdescription.para: Creates the storage image which the path tracing shaders will write to.
Used to create a path tracing pipeline.

parameterdescription.para: The descriptor set layouts for the shaders.

briefdescription.para: Used to record the actual path tracing commands to a given command buffer.

parameterdescription.para: The command buffer to record to.
The current image in the swapchain.

briefdescription.para: Manages the building process of the acceleration structures.
